Dear Prof Goodwin,
I'm very happy for having discovered the Cantera project, and first 
of all thank you for your contribution.
I would like to couple Cantera surface chemistry to fluent 3D code, 
which basically uses C language-user defined functions. In which way 
would you suggest to do that?
Thank you so much in advance.
Regards. Vincenzo.
